Class DeviceActionImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceActionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, DeviceAction, Storable
public class DeviceActionImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements DeviceAction
Action for activating devices triggered by an action plan.
Author:
Douglas Lau
